name: Breathe (itch) (Aaron El Sabrout)
description:
Take a breath ...

with this small meditation game. Walk around the park, commune with nature, and learn how to breathe again.

This game deals with mental health themes (including anxiety, depression, and body image) so please keep that in mind!

Made in Twine for A Game By Its Cover Jam 2022, based on the lovely cover art by nbmach1ne.
